overview:
Evan Bailyn is an entrepreneur that owns a number of internet-based businesses, most notably Cartoon Doll Emporium, a Comscore-Ranked Top 10 Online Kids Property, and First Page Sage, a search engine optimization company that cites a near-perfect record of getting client websites onto the first page of Google.

He maintains a blog about the importance of remaining childlike.
